alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 3:03AM PST until December 04 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Snow accumulations of up to one inch. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, South Willamette Valley, Cascade Foothills in Lane County and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold air trapped in some mountain valleys may cause icy conditions well into the day, even after most nearby areas change over to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington:

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley
